heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on our upcoming events and be part of our healing community.
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All Rights Reserved.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral beverage from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). This mixture creates a powerful brew that opens the doors to perception and deep spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level. It purifies the body, helps release emotional blockages, and expands consciousness, allowing you to access profound states of introspection and self-knowledge. It is a journey inward, guided by the spirit of the plant.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, guides, and heals. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with this ancient wisdom, offering clarity on your life's purpose, healing past wounds, and revealing the path to a more authentic and fulfilling life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to their deepest questions and a new sense of direction in their lives.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It helps to process and heal deep traumas, fears, and unresolved emotional patterns.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It facilitates a profound connection with oneself, with others, and with the universe, fostering a sense of unity and belonging.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a shared experience where collective energy enhances individual healing. It is an opportunity to connect with others on a deep and authentic level.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized process, we offer private ceremonies tailored to your specific needs and intentions.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn more about the sacred medicine of Ayahuasca, its origins, and its transformative power.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guides who will accompany you on this journey of healing and self-discovery.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find here all the recommendations to prepare your body, mind, and spirit.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you with love, respect, and deep wisdom on your healing journey.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for healing and transformation.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here. Click save when you're done.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. This action can be reversed.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the Past Events section.
errorFinishingCeremony: Failed to mark ceremony as finished.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from public view, but it can be reactivated later.
defaultContributionText: Contribution per person. You can reserve with 20%.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to view the ceremony details. Please sign in or register.
editGuideDescription: Modify the guide's information. Click save when you're finished.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide from the list.
editHeroVideoDescription: Update the main video on the homepage.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome! I am your spiritual guide from The Art of Healing. How can I assist you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings here.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in your system.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireDescription: Your sincere answers help us ensure a safe and profound experience for everyone. This information is confidential.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, diabetes)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or supplements)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or explore...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
mustBeLoggedInToViewCeremonies: You must be logged in to view the ceremonies. Please sign in or register.
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this content. Please sign in to continue.
dialogSuccessDescription: You are one step closer. The next crucial step is to carefully follow the preparation guide to get your body and mind ready.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted their questionnaire yet.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please re-login with your new email.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm this change.
preparationPageTitle: Your Path to a Profound Experience
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin to align your body and mind.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The night of the encounter with the sacred medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep inner journey of healing and revelation.
integrationProcessDescription: Bringing the teachings of the ceremony into your daily life.
dietTitle: The Dieta: Nourishing Body and Soul
dietSubtitle: The pre-ceremony diet is crucial to purify your body and open your spirit to the medicine. It is recommended to start at least 3-7 days before.
allowedFoodsList: Grains like quinoa, rice, and oats
White meats (chicken, fish) in moderation and boiled/grilled
Plenty of water and herbal teas
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your inner state is as important as your physical diet.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to record your thoughts, dreams, and emotions during the preparation.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca is a powerful tool for emotional healing. It allows you to access and release repressed emotions, forgive, and find deep inner peace. It's a process of letting go of what no longer serves you to make space for the new.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your sacred space with these essential items for your comfort.
comfortItemsList: A warm blanket and a pillow or cushion
A change of clothes for the next day
essentialsList: A notebook and pen for journaling
An open heart and a willingness to surrender to the process
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates used to invite users to fill out the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Este es un nuevo mensaje de plantilla en español.
newTemplateMessageEN: This is a new template message in English.
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}}.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
defaultInvitationMessageES: ¡Hola! Te invitamos a completar el cuestionario médico para continuar con tu proceso de reserva en El Arte de Sanar. Puedes hacerlo aquí: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire
defaultInvitationMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire
systemLogsDescription: Review errors caught by the system.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the error log.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the caught error.
importSuccessDescription: Data has been imported and overwritten.
exportDataDescription: Download all critical data as a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Import data from a backup JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite all existing data with the content of the backup file. This cannot be undone, although an automatic backup will be created before importing.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can roll back to this state if the import caused issues.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the data from the backup created just before the last import. Are you sure you want to proceed?

noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
